artist.name: Aayushman Parmar
artist.tagline: Written, Sequenced & Produced by Aayushman Parmar
artist.bio: Aayushman Parmar is an independent conceptual artist whose music explores generational legacy, identity, spirituality, and the silent emotional architecture of Indian households. His debut album 'Manah Kalah' examines the evolving perspective of a son toward his family â€” moving from internalized pressure and isolation toward reconciliation, empathy, and emotional maturity.
